channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree watering required, 10th July
item.description:
All the green bags are empty and yet the trees are suffering in this drought. Please fill them with water.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Green, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cut hedges!!!!!!, 10th July
item.description:
Overgrown. Second time reporting. Whole pathway needs cutting it is VERY dangerous and will cause a accident
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Iron Mill Lane, Crayford, London

item.title: Bush overgrown and blocking traffic visibility, 10th July
item.description:
A bush has grown huge and makes crossing that bit of the pavement dangerous as can't see cars coming round the corner. The same issue when driving. It needs to be removed sadly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, Bagshot Street, Old Kent Road, London

Crown lane spur, middle of road near junction of Macintosh Street
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crown Lane Spur, Southborough, London

item.title: Mould overtaking fkat, 10th July
item.description:
Mould has been taking over our flat and my partner has asthma, landlord just keep wiping it away and ignoring us. It’s gotten so bad it’s growing into my bed and my landlord is refusing to do anything

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tyssen Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: See you again, garbage!, 10th July
item.description:
Never tried their food, but their waste disposal approach needs some work

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Charlton Church Lane, Charlton, London

item.title: Large Branch obstucting road, 10th July
item.description:
Branch has fallen off tree and is obstructing the road - concern for road users and it stretches almost across to the other side of pavement. Cars will have to go on the pavement to pass
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodlands Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked roadway drain gully, 10th July
item.description:
Blocked for a number of years. Clearing it would efficiently remove downstream rainwater with ease
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain causes flooding during rain, 10th July
item.description:
There used to be works to replace all the pavement titles at this location, but since the work was completed, this drain has been blocked and has been flooding the corner when it rains. I don't know if a protective drain cover was placed inside due to the work. When it rains, it floods and it prevents the safe use of the pedestrian crossing path.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marban Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Food stored outside in bins, 10th July
item.description:
Food is being stored outside in bins and people are taking from them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 85, King's Road, Chelsea, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegetation overgrown at crossing to Elmstead Woods and making it difficult to see traffic and it could cause an accident. I reported this before and yesterday received an email to say it had been dealt with. But it hasn’t and the overgrown trees and bushes at the crossing are making it difficult to see cars and you have to go in road to look, 10th July
item.description:
Overgrown bushes and trees next to crossing from Elmstead woods in Elmstead lane to other side of road causing blind spot. Could cause accident.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmstead Lane, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds need treatment, 10th July
item.description:
Weeds up both sides of Styles Way, Pavements and gutter need treatment as they are getting out of control, damaging the unique road kerbs in the conservation area and spoiling the character of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Styles Way, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping and waste, 10th July
item.description:
We once again have fly tipping outside and rubbish strewn across the entrance to our flat. Our bin area needs to be contained. When will Hackney council take this seriously? It poses a health and safety risk and encourages pests.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Foulden Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large bag of hedge/weed cuttings dumped on grass, 10th July

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Palewell Close, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: Kitchen Hob and bagged waste outside Brunswick House Balcombe Street, 10th July
item.description:
There is a continuing issue of rubbish being left out on Balcombe Street. Please carry out enforcement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 92, Balcombe Street, Marylebone, London

item.title: Posts vandalised, 10th July
item.description:
The wooden posts on the edge of the green chain walk have been vandalised, they have been completely pulled out by the ever increasing number of kids accumulating and causing a disturbance on this stretch of green chain walk and road at the end of Wayside Grove.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wayside Grove, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
